=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: O!GETi Vitamin C Foam Cleanser | Foaming Facial Cleanser, Perfect Pore Cleansing Foam, Face Wash for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Sebum Reducing, Moisture Control & Minimizing Pores, Korean Skin Care, Gift for Women, Paraben-free, 4.23 Oz (120g)
Review Date: 2021/05/13
Store: O!GETi
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'O!GETi', 'Scent': 'Tangerine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
Review Text: I got this scrub for my wife to try while in her nightly baths. She has used it now several times, and reports that it is very nice. The citrus scent is pleasant, and the scrub goes on smoothly and easily. Just a little bit of it is all that is needed to create a nice, effective cleansing foam. After using it, my wife says her skin feels soft and refreshed. There is a generous amount in the bottle. I recommend this.
Review Title: Very Pleasant Scrub
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
COSMETEA Korean Essence Face Masks - T1 Oolong Tea Hydrating Ampoule Full Facial Masks 10 Pack Treatments, Care Your Skin Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Purifying, Deep Moisturizing with Hyaluronic Acid
Cosmetea
{'Brand': 'Cosmetea', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.8 x 1.8 inches; 13.62 Ounces'}
My wife experiences dry, itchy skin, especially during the colder months. She tried these masks over a period of a couple of months last winter and spring to see if they could make a difference, and I'm happy to report that she gives them a positive rating for several reasons. They have mild ingredients derived from oolong tea and hyaluronic acid (which she has used in other products). The masks are very easy to apply: with some gentle, even pressure she was able to get them evenly onto her skin. After leaving the mask on for about 15 minutes, she felt a definite hydrating result. My wife recommends these!
Excellent, Hydrating Masks!
Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Argan Magic
{'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'}
I got this oil for my wife to try, and she really likes it. She reports that it goes on smoothly and feels light on her skin (unlike some other oils she has used). The scent is mild/neutral. It also leaves her skin feeling nicely moisturized and smooth, which is especially welcomed in the colder weather when her skin tends to dry out. Highly recommended.
Excellent Oil

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user continues to emphasize hydration in their skincare routine, particularly focusing on products that effectively address dryness. Their recent interaction reveals a trend toward exploring gentle skincare solutions suitable for sensitive skin, exemplified by their wife's positive experience with a new cleanser. The user's preference for products with enjoyable textures and pleasant scents aligns with their commitment to an efficient and convenient skincare routine.

They remain committed to using natural, effective ingredients, valuing formulations that promote both cleansing and hydration. The user’s concern for animal welfare is consistent, as evidenced by their choice for cruelty-free products that align with their ethical values.

Their family-oriented approach to skincare is illustrated by their influence on product selection, prioritizing shared experiences that enhance their routine. Continued focus is placed on products that deliver deep moisture and comfort, especially during seasonal transitions where skin hydration is critical.

Overall, the user seeks a balanced skincare regimen that combines effective cleansing with hydration, all while ensuring that the products they choose are convenient, ethically sourced, and enjoyable for both themselves and their wife.
